title: Ticket #3362: Blahp delegates new proxy formats incorrectly
description:
When a job has proxy, the blahp makes a new, limited, proxy from it using grid-proxy-init. It uses the -old flag of grid-proxy-init, which means the new proxy should be in the old proxy format. If the original proxy isn't in the old format, then grid-proxy-init will fail, as you can't mix format within a chain of proxies.

The -old flag should be omitted. grid-proxy-init ensures the new proxy is the same format as the original one.
